meanings.definition: A light and entertaining piece of music
meanings.sent1: The orchestra played a divertimento that made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy listening to divertimenti while relaxing at home.
meanings.sent3: The divertimento was so catchy that it got stuck in my head all day.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a divertimento, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The divertimento danced through the air, lifting spirits with its melody.

meanings.definition: An activity that provides amusement or enjoyment
meanings.sent1: Going to the amusement park was a divertimento for the whole family.
meanings.sent2: Playing board games with friends is always a divertimento for me.
meanings.sent3: The divertimento of watching the squirrels chase each other in the park was delightful.
meanings.sent4: Her storytelling was a divertimento, painting vivid pictures in our minds.
meanings.sent5: The beach vacation was a divertimento, filled with laughter and relaxation.
